formattedAddress: 1400 Broadway Suite 103-105, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1400 Broadway Suite 103-105, New York, NY 10018, USA

editorialSummary.text: Casual counter-serve chain for build-your-own sandwiches & salads, with health-conscious options.

originalText.text: I got a fountain seltzer water and a bag of Lays. I don’t know what this Subway location is doing but that was the most perfect bag of chips I’ve had. There were very few crumbs. Most of the chips were large and intact. The fountain drink was clean and the bubbles were nice.

text.text: I got a fountain seltzer water and a bag of Lays. I don’t know what this Subway location is doing but that was the most perfect bag of chips I’ve had. There were very few crumbs. Most of the chips were large and intact. The fountain drink was clean and the bubbles were nice.

originalText.text: This is a great Subway! I cannot say enough positive things about the staff, especially Madhu. I went to this shop a few times when I first starting working in the area, and since then, she has always remembered me and my exact order. I rarely receive this level of service from any shop, let alone a chain restaurant. She is a treasure! Today I was thinking of going to another place for lunch, but then I thought, "I haven't gone to Subway in a while, I should say hi" and got my usual. Great, great team. Thank you!!

text.text: This is a great Subway! I cannot say enough positive things about the staff, especially Madhu. originalText.text: Your average Subway shop. The address is misleading because they are not on Broadway. It’s located on 39th street between Broadway and 6th Ave. They still offer select footling subs for $5. I’ve mobile order here a few times and my order is always ready for pickup when I arrive. Staff is professional and the store is decently clean. There’s a few tables if you want to eat it.

text.text: Your average Subway shop. The address is misleading because they are not on Broadway. originalText.text: I’m a regular at this Subway and I like all the employees here they are so kind to me everytime I walk in but today I was really disappointed and the reason I’m disappointed is not because of any of the employees but because of the management and how they suck at treating their employees. I walked into the store on Sunday afternoon and it was tooo hot like you cannot stand there and I don’t know how the girl managed to handle everything. Seriously I hope she is ok because despite how hot it was she still greeted the customers with a smile and she was sweating like crazy. Like no one would work in such a heat! It is really outrageous to see how badly the employees are being treated as if their lives don’t matter. The person who manages the store should come and see for themselves how bad it feels to work in such an environment. This one star is for the employees who make my sandwich they’re doing a great job!

originalText.text: I visisted this store it was soooo hot in there idk how the employees manage to work in this heat and they don't care abt their employees. There employees was so nice and friendly too but the owner need to fix the ac system even the employees was sweating like hell
